name: new white minimal facebook
description:
hello again, i finally got new facebook and had a chance to make a new version of my old white minimal theme. i'll still leave the old one up for people still on old facebook. from the old theme page:

a clean, white, minimal facebook for your viewing pleasure. this theme neatens up your top bar and makes it white, hides ads, and reduces sidebar clutter. (this version also adds a new font!)

NOTE: it hides all the sidebars except favourites, so move all your necessary groups and apps up there for easy access.
